website_summaries.verdict: This model offers equal dependability for both wet and dry shaves in an electric razor specially designed for sensitive skin.
pros: Gives a surprisingly close wet shave
The razor moves smoothly over skin due to the built-in glide guard, which prevents the rashes and bumps
cons: The included cleaning system is bulky, requiring more bathroom counter space than expected

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you’re too aggressive with your shave, the head will continuously pop off
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R.

customer_reviews.title: Look for opened boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Again disappointed. This razor had been opened, however, it did seem that it had been re-packed expertly so I chanced to open the box. The razor head would not close indicating that a small tab had been snapped off on the razor head. This was the third Philips razor purchased by me in the last 30 days or less. The first one was a Philips 6500 and it had obviously been opened so I returned it for a replacement. The replacement would not charge so again I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: BULLDG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome razor!
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome electric shaver. The battery lasts 3 months for me, and I use it once a day, sometimes twice a day if I have a formal event in the evening. It is easy to clean, I don't really use the SmartClean system too much though.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a good shave
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned an Philips Arcitec shaver for 30 yrs. When their new replacement blades came out they irritated, my face badly. I tried most of the cheap “replacements“ and they were terrible. Finally I thought I would try a new moderately priced model. I couldn’t see how Philips could stay in business with another poor product. This shaver is great. All of the features listed are true. So, for the price of 4 cheap replacement heads you can have the shaver that works like the one you had for many years. And since you now only need to purchase the circular blades and not the whole head, maintenance is less expensive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Electric vs Razor
customer_reviews.text: Do not have experience with electrics per se, however, the cut is relatively good, though clearly not as precise as a hand held razor. From the standpoint of traveling and having to get quick shave on the go, this electric is quite interesting. I still use a razor now and then when I need that close clean shave, however as I have become older, electrics are the way to go and your skin is not nearly raw. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Holden

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent results
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this razor more. It does a POOR job on stubble that's 2 days plus. It does an AWFUL job on your neck and underneath your nose. It does a decent job on my bald head though. I like that you can use it in the shower, although the process takes twice as long. It cleans VERY EASILY and VERY WELL. Decent, but not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shaver Imaginable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who has been trying to get it to give him a close shave which has been impossible. It does a superficial job at best and each time he uses it shaves worse and worse. There must be a magic to this that he doesn't understand, but to put it mildly, he hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Traci King

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product. Like my older models much better.
customer_reviews.text: I like the older models better. This model seems to get caught on my face. Not the blades but the edges of the shaving head. Also, it does not give me a close shave. I have to really work at getting a close shave with it. Also the cleaning base is kind of big. Overall, I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GPierce

customer_reviews.title: This shaver is great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is great for sensitive skin. The reason for 4 stars is that the blades do not cut as close as advertised. Good razor for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Finn

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner base died after two months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my senior dad. Razor works well, but the "cleaning station" died after less than 2 months, which is nuts for a $169 razor set-up. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fishmom

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I've had
customer_reviews.text: Wow this shaver is top of the line! I feel like I'm able to get a professional shave now at home. I even went out and bought shaving cream, as previously with other shavers I just used to dry shave. This really gets in there and leaves my face smoother than a baby's butt. Good times indeed.
customer_reviews.author: boss435

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Went from a Philips Norelco Shaver 6100 to this 7500 and was more than impressed. My old shaver just didn't get as close as I'd like and was kind of scratchy feeling, as well as pretty loud. This is the opposite of all of that! It gets pretty much as close as a blade, smooth and comfortable on my sensitive face and neck, and pretty quiet. The cleaning is a little noisy, but not so bad. I wouldn't clean it ass you're trying to go to bed, but clean after every use. The cleaner smells good too, leaving your face smelling pretty good. All around worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Clean Shave
customer_reviews.text: I have never used an electric razor. I found the instructions confusing but once that I got the hang of it I was thoroughly impressed. Easy to use & basically performs its own maintenance and gives a good shave. Not quite as good as a razor but close enough. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love my new razor. The built in cleaning system is awesome. Quick and easy to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good but could shave a little closer
customer_reviews.text: It works well and the battery lasts forever. I wish it gave a little closer shave. I always still have a shadow after I shave the mustache area.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done..
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this electric shaver. It looks brand new still and works great. It has a great battery life but he doesn't use it as much so I'm sure that play a role on the life of the battery. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: PHILIPS NORELCO ELECTRIC SHAVER 7500 FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband since his old Philips Norelco wore out. He loves it and uses daily. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Self cleaning system cleans very well. It’s perfect for man who are lazy to wash their shavers, just like my boo... Overall it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more irritated skin clean close shave
customer_reviews.text: Have shaver few day now I have sensitive skin and tough facial hair I have used electric shaver alway irritated my face .philip norelco shaver 7500 works great clean close shave no more irrition now matter how many time I use it
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Fake item made in China not Netherlands as the real one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my father and I was sooo embarrassed!! It didn’t work properly. The packaging was so cheap and it was clear that it was a fake item, and made in china. The real product comes in a very nice package, showing made in Netherlands!
customer_reviews.author: Rooli

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a gift, it came earlier than expected, product is exactly as described right down to the color. My son is very happy with this product & says it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn O.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shsve
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver have to get use to shaver from shaving with disposable razor. Cleans nice. Although I wish the motor was more faster or more torque. I seems it runs slow. Great shaver !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Very complicated to use and did more damage ( razor ...
customer_reviews.text: Very complicated to use and did more damage ( razor burns) then my old razor. Put it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: r c cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: Great razor, gives clean shave, self cleaning feature is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: shrewd

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice razor. Easy to clean and does a wonderful job shaving.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice razor. Teenage grandson loved it. More reasonably priced than the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband. He likes it very much. Sensitive skin, so he likes the “floating head” feature.
customer_reviews.author: DARLENE SANDFORD

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst electric shaver I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst electric shaver I've ever had. I have a very light beard, and it will barely shave me without taking twice as long as any other shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Get quality!
customer_reviews.text: I cheaped out and bought a 40 dollar shaver that I returned in a day. I should learn to buy the quality product first. This is a quality product. What a difference. A very smooth shaver and incredibly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shave - Comfortable for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from Gillette Fusion to this electric shaver. It glides nice, shaves well, and is real quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband at Christmas, he has loved it! Super impressed with the close shave and the ability to use wet or dry. Works wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Husband says it's a great shave. Comfortable and close. WIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Used as a Christmas gift. My dad is very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: diane ciomperlik

customer_reviews.title: He says it is even better than he expected after watching it be advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this razor for my hubs for Christmas and he loves it. He says it is even better than he expected after watching it be advertised.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: the shaver is absolutely great, very quite and well placed in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: avivor1975

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory product
customer_reviews.text: Product does not shave close enough to be satisfactory. Trimmer that came with the product does not fit. It is obviously designed to fit a different shaver, so it is not usable. I wish to return this item..
customer_reviews.author: Roy C Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Close comfortable shave
customer_reviews.text: I like to be able to use shaving gel and the closeness of the shave. I do hVe a concern about having to replace the cleaning solution every three months as this adds to the cost of using this particular model
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for senative skin
customer_reviews.text: Have very sensitive skin. Best electric razor I ever used. I am getting rid of my razors. Can use with or without shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: The Order Warehouse

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent shaver, nice you can buy changeable heads and it comes with a cleaner dock
customer_reviews.author: tflatt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price if you have a thick beard.
customer_reviews.text: Love shaving with this razor. Self-cleaning and fast charge feature is a great step up from previous electric razors.
customer_reviews.author: The Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shaver met all expectations from the reviews. Shave is very close without abrasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motel code
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically a good fit. Does not shave as closely as my previous model. Power seems to decrease slightly after the first few minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not good as
customer_reviews.text: Not really helping me with the sensitive skin issue, not good as expected
customer_reviews.author: roey shwalb

customer_reviews.title: Operates very well
customer_reviews.text: No complaints of pulling hairs nor of leaving rashes from my husband. It was a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA LUSIGNAN

customer_reviews.title: Not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does an excellent job for face hair. Can't cut neck hair at all. Don't buy it unless you dream of being a complete neckbeard, in which case this is the razor for you.
customer_reviews.author: Levi van Tine

customer_reviews.title: but now I love it. No more razor burn
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to get used to, but now I love it. No more razor burn. I like the cleaning system, too. Much better than earlier version.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Seaver, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: better life
customer_reviews.text: It gives me a better life and makes my face feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Wang

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Not a lot of noise. Highly recommend! Yes
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not performing as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The shaver doesn’t work as advertised. This is after receiving it yesterday and I’m already trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua johnson

customer_reviews.title: Trump being in the White House
customer_reviews.text: I use it for shaving a couple times a week between blade shaves. They promised delivery by the 25th and it arrived on the 22nd. Very pleased. James.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on Smart Clean unit
customer_reviews.text: The power cord does not fit the Smart Clean unit. Norelco obviously made a manufacturing error. The Smart Clean unit is a worthless addition to the package with no way to power it.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando825

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old likes it. Easier then a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Louann

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Probably not a great value at its price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Probably not a great value at its price. Haven't tried cleaning system yet. Takes several passes to shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Poor shaving results compared to much cheaper other brands. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rawhi Omar, MD, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new razor. It was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL GERLING

customer_reviews.title: head (blade assy) falls off while shaving
customer_reviews.text: the head falls off while shaving making a mess. Philips has no answer on this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Smooth shave with easy maneuvering over my face with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We got it 3 months ago and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chip Minger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfect for clean shave and it’s quick 😉
customer_reviews.author: Vidhyarranyan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not wanted any longer. Performance was not as expected plus price too high.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Klink

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick shave, but can't compete with a razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that’s it’s a quick charge
customer_reviews.text: I like that’s it’s a quick charge. Quick click change between heads. That it can be used in wet and dry conditions and the best is it cleans quite well too and it’s pretty quiet too
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: without power cord
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with power cord so I bought it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jaeui Song

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This did not do what was promised. Gave a lousy shave. I retired it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: rica arnon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great electric shaver, keeps the charge and cleans - very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome razor, great quality best razor I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Chair shopper

customer_reviews.title: Really tough on the skin.
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace my Braun. It's really tough on the face. It's for my special needs son. I prefer the Braun, but the cost of the replacement foils for the Braun have made it prohibitive. But this one really tears up his face.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: terrible shave. After only 6+ months I replaced the cutter. Still lousy shave. Bought for my husband with extremely sensitive skin. Have to over the same areas again and again. Not good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Berger

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It will do as well as I need. I’m not a daily shave type so need to use a blade for a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I could eliminate my straight razor. Never happen with this. Nearly impossible to get a shave close enough for my taste. I don't consider that I have a heavy beard but I cannot get a close shave with this razor. They claim it takes 3 weeks to settle in to a close shave. I'll stick with it and if my opinion changes I will update but at this point, I am very sorry I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good shaver for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well if you're not trying to replicate a non-powered shaver's results. As long as you shave once every 2 days it gives you a shave comparable to any other electric razor I've used, after that it starts to miss hairs. It's one of the easiest shavers on the face I've ever used however and that seems to be it's main selling point, on this front it does very well. The auto clean system is kind of a joke though so...if that's at all something you are basing your purchase on look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: A Random Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite shaver
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I’ve had ever. I went from shaving every single day to every other day. This thing shaves hairs I didn’t even know I had. Leaves my cane feeling baby but smooth that my wife can’t take her hands off my face. The washing base is nice. Battery life on the actual razor is awesome it lasted about a month before I needed to recharge it. But that’s only because the batteries is new so I’m sure is more use at the less life length the battery will have. Definitely worth every penny I spend on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kopolovitz

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I've never been pleased with electric shavers, but I thought I would give it another try, since we are going on an extended vacation. This model is waterproof, and the description says it's great for sensitive skin. It's the first electric I've had that doesn't bite me. Using a little soap and water on my face makes it glide nicely, and the shave is nearly as good as a blade, with no cuts or nicks.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence of PA

customer_reviews.title: Shaves well but inconvenient trimmer
customer_reviews.text: It shaves well. But instead of the normal pop-up trimmer, you must yank the shaver head off and press on the trimmer. That might be worth the trouble if the trimmer were better. But it's no better than a pop-up. So I've taken to keeping a separate trimmer handy for sideburns and mustache. I also never use the cleaning apparatus that's packaged with many high-end shavers. I see no need for that, when a simple rinse works.
customer_reviews.author: Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Better for my legs than face
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is great, Tho I wont use it for my face much as it also rips my face up, So I'll continue to use my flawless Philips One Blade for my face. I use this shaver for my legs and body, its amazing for that job, I'm sure its because my face is super sensitive so anything it doesnt like It lets me know about two hours later with extreme redness or acne the next day from hair being toarn out.
customer_reviews.author: Helix

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get every hair
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t cut close and easy as advertised. I have to go over the same area’s repeatedly!!! Example my neck is difficult to shave with this razor and it always leaves a few hairs that I have to use a regular hand razor to get
customer_reviews.author: Olon

customer_reviews.title: You can find a better shaver than this.
customer_reviews.text: I've had 5 Norelco shavers before this one. If this was the first, I never would have bought another. The cutting blades are hard to reinstall and they want them rinsed daily. So they include this huge cleaning device that takes up too much counter space. The shaver grabs skin and whiskers instead of cutting. I'm not impressed with this shaver. My next one won't be a Norelco.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hanna

customer_reviews.title: This electric razor is great. I have several medical problems and prescriptions that ...
customer_reviews.text: My previous Norelco shaver was purchased in 2005. This electric razor is great. My husband has several medical problems and prescriptions that have changed his skin from tough like alligator skin, to now easy to bruise and tear. This shaver was made for him, no more burning his neck. I recommend for anyone with sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.author: beth gappa

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband and he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! To charge and clean just stick it into the base unit and push down on the top. He has had other shavers that he did not like but he loves this one!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Norelco-Phillips 7500 Series shaver (for senitive skin)
customer_reviews.text: Have used Norelco shavers since I was a young man (right after the Civil War ended I think) so no learning period needed for me. I like the lighter, more maneuverable design and the quick charge capability. Only comment is the cleaning tank assembly works fine, but it's HUGE. Uses up a lot of real estate on the bathroom sink area. Bottom line: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Smooooooth
customer_reviews.text: This razor works very well on my sensative skin. I was using a Norelco 9000 series razor and was getting a rash every time, but when I swithed to this razor, I no longer have a rash. It is very comfortable to use, smooth as silk.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing great quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have Norelco electric razor all my life and this one it's the best one jet. Easy to use and clean and the base not only keeps it clean but also charges the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaver for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My son brought this shaver to college with him. It's the only one he can use that doesn't irritate his extremely sensitive skin. He also loves how it's self cleaning. The size of the cleaning receptacle is large, but he feels it needs to be that size to accommodate the thorough cleaning it does ( his science brain theory - works for me ).
customer_reviews.author: LadyArt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This shaver doesn't shave very close and seems to miss a lot of area under my chin. Don't know whether it's operator error or the shaver. Was expensive shaver for quality of shave. Had to use regular blade to get my under chin and neck clean. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shave
customer_reviews.text: tried it for the first time and give close smooth shave. Looking forward to years of use. I highly recommend this electric. Will be great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Razor - 5 stars Trimmer - 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: the razor and cleaning station are great. The trimmer attachment is a let down. for how great the razor is, the trimmer is equally as bad. I'm going to purchase a separate trimmer it's that bad, just to clean up my sideburns and around my ears.
customer_reviews.author: troland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for father
customer_reviews.text: That was a gift for my father on his birthday! He was excited! Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ilze

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier model where the cleaner had died. So far this one is working great. After almost a month, I'm still working on the first charge. I'm just hoping that the pump on the cleaning unit lasts longer than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Not a close shave at all. It takes 45 minutes to get a close shave.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a close shave. I had to go over every area countless times.
customer_reviews.author: the ace degenerate

customer_reviews.title: but good enough if shave your head daily
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet compared to my old Panasonic Arc 4. I use this for shaving my face and head daily. I have only used it once to dry shave (in 3 months); I typically uses it wet with shaving cream/gel. I get a very close shave on my face, but not as close on the head; but good enough if shave your head daily. I have found that the only way to get a smooth head shave is with a razor blade.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: My husband said this is the best electric razor he’s ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Needs a basic charger
customer_reviews.text: My last razor came with a cleaning base and just a basic charger. I wish this one did too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: Finally a razor that is really smooth. No problems at all so far with this Norelco 7500 Shaver. Boston Bob
customer_reviews.author: Boston Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it's price
customer_reviews.text: This shaver feels like it has NO cutting power & the blades are JUNK too.
customer_reviews.author: Kid Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor. It has been a really long time since I’ve had an electric razor. I have weird skin and electric razors never really worked for me. This one does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: timboflop

customer_reviews.title: Just what my husband wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as he is always complaining about his old old one. This fixed him right up.
customer_reviews.author: J Bur

customer_reviews.title: Good product - gives good close shaves
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, gives good close shaves and is exactly as advertised. I have used it for dry shaves, but prefer shaves with a shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Worse then previous generation Norelco shaver.
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to get close shave with this electric shaver. I never had this issue with previous Philips shaver which is cheaper 4000 series. I had to return this item and ordered another 5000 series shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. The razor head keeps falling off.. He hates it. The razor isn't even 6 months old and he can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: foxbite2

customer_reviews.title: Not a clean shave.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't shave below your jaw line completely. Not worth the money unless you want to look like missed spots shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 7500 for Sensitive Skin
product_meta.description: The new Philips Norelco Series 7000 delivers our most comfortable shave with less irritation. Comfort Rings glide effortlessly over your skin to reduce friction while the GentleTrack blades cut every hair for exceptionally smooth skin. Automatic voltage - 100-240 V.
feature_bullets: Philips' No.1 on sensitive skin - Comfort with anti-friction coating for a smooth glide
Gentle Precision Blade System - Protects your skin while cutting extremely close on long, short and flat-lying hairs
Dynamic Flex heads effortlessly move in 5 directions to follow every curve of your face and neck for a more comfortable shave
With AquaTec technology you can enjoy a comfortable dry shave or a refreshing wet shave with gel or foam - even under the shower
SmartClick precision trimmer for perfect mustache and sideburn trimming;Ergonomic grip & handling

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
